titles.title: How Sweet How Heavenly (get the 1st verse down

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How sweet how heav'nly is the sight When those who love the Lord In one another's peace delight And so fulfill His Word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When each can feel His brother's sigh And with Him bear apart When sorrow flows from eye to eye And joy from heart to heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When free from envy scorn and pride Our wishes all above Each can His brother's failings hide And show a brother's love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When love in one delightful stream Thro' ev'ry bosom flows When union sweet and dear esteem In ev'ry action glows{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love is the golden chain that binds The saints to Christ above And He is heaven's heir that finds His bosom glow with love{/lang-eng}
